directions: Mix gelatin and cold water in a small saucepan, and let the mixture stand until gelatin thickens. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly until gelatin dissolves. Remove from heat, and let cool; do not let set.
Whip cream, sugar, and vanilla until slightly thickened.  Continue beating slowly, while gradually adding the gelatin.  Whip at high speed until stiff.
title: Whipped Cream Icing I
